title: EPA Phone Home!
detail: In developing world contexts, measure if water and air is safe using simple sensors with an iphone.
extended_details: Developing countries are getting access to smart phones before they get access to clean water.  With low-power, low-cost sensors a smart phone can  take all the measurements needed to establish that a water sample or surrounding air is safe or dangerous.  I plan on reading the sensor data in, processing it in iOS, and communicating it to the user with the iPhone API.

parts_and_costs.part: One-Wire Ambient Temperature Sensor - MAX31820 - SEN-14049 - SparkFun
NODE+ Sensor Platform (no motion processor) – Variable, Inc.
